SEARCH

Uses of Package
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.text

Packages that use nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.text
Package
Description
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api
This package contains various APIs used throughout the project, including definitions for animated blocks, colors, debugging, factories, highlighted block spawners, the platform interface, and more.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api.factories
This package contains various factories for creating objects used in the project.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.text
This package contains text-related utilities used for communication with users.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.tooluser
Contains the classes for the tool users system.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.tooluser.creator
The creator package contains classes that are responsible for creating structures.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.core.implementations
This package contains classes that provide implementations for various interfaces in the core module for the Spigot platform.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util.implementations
Provides implementations of AnimatedArchitecture core interfaces that can be used by all modules for the Spigot platform.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util.text
Provides utility classes and Text implementations that depend on the Spigot API and can be used by all modules for the Spigot platform.
  • Classes in nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.text used by nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api
    Class
    Description
    Text
    Represents a piece of text with styled sections.
    TextType
    Represents the different types of Text used by CAP.

  • Classes in nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.text used by nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.text
    Class
    Description
    ColorScheme
    Represents a colorscheme that can be used to add styles to text.
    ColorScheme.ColorSchemeBuilder
     
    ITextComponentFactory
    Represents a factory for TextComponents that can be used to create specialized text components with additional ITextDecorators.
    ITextDecorator
    Represents a decoration of a piece of text.
    ITextRenderer
    Represents an interface that is used to render Text to other formats.
    Text
    Represents a piece of text with styled sections.
    TextArgument
    Represents an argument in a piece of text.
    TextArgumentFactory
    Contains some quality-of-life features to aid the creation of new TextArguments.
    TextComponent
    Represents a component in a piece of text that has zero or more ITextDecorator to add features such as colors or clickable links, etc.
    TextType
    Represents the different types of Text used by CAP.
